title: Ticket #1725: condor_submit trips over semicolon in environment variables
description: A user posted a problem on the condor-users mailing list that when getenv is set to true, environment variables specified with a semi-colon as delimiter are ignored. This certainly should not be the case and we should investigate more closely whether there are other characters causing problems.
remarks: Interestingly, I have not been able to reproduce this problem so far. I have not tried Condor 7.4.2 yet, but with versions 7.4.4 or the current master, it just works as expected.
creator: cweiss
